title: Emergency Management of Infectious Diseases
role_in_edaitutor: Evidence-based infectious disease reference for emergency medicine, covering sepsis, CNS infections, respiratory pathogens, tropical medicine, and ED antimicrobials.

chapters.summary: Outlines early recognition and ED management of sepsis and severe systemic infections.
Summarises ED evaluation and treatment of central nervous system infections.
Covers common and high-risk respiratory infections requiring ED assessment and treatment.
Provides a structured ED approach to skin and soft tissue infections including red flags for necrotising fasciitis.
Summarises evaluation and empiric management of travel-related and tropical infections.
